titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Robert B. Moran Papers
titlestmt.author: Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

note.p: This encoded finding aid is compliant with Stanford EAD Best Practice Guidelines, Version 1.0.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview
did.abstract: Papers include class lecture notes, personal notes, two diaries of reflections on his trip to California and family background (1886-1900).

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: Robert B. Moran Papers (SC0052). Department of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Sketch
bioghist.p: Stanford undergraduate (1903-1907). Geologist specializing in oil.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Papers include class lecture notes, personal notes, two diaries of reflections on his trip to California and family background (1886-1900).

did.unittitle: Stanford Handbooks containing notes, registrar's receipts
Lecture notes including notebooks from the following courses: Hstory 4; Geometry; Dynamics; Constructive materials
Lectures notes including notebooks from the following courses: Chemistry 11; Surveying; Latin Composition I
Westinghouse Electric and Manufacturing Company, Pittsburg, Pennsylvania, Circulars: 1027 May, 1904; 1028 October, 1904; 1079 April, 1904; 1086 July, 1904; 1094 October, 1904; 1098 February, 1905
The Oil Weekly; Volume 93, number 6, "Peruvian Developments", page 48
Felt Lake HR Computations (possibly a term paper)
Colonial Services of Ancestors of Nathan Montgomery Moran (genealogy)
Agreement between Mt. Diablo Mill and Mining Company and G. H. Clevenger, et. al. Includes Robert B. Moran as a witness to the agreement .
Laboratory notes on Qualitative Analysis and Physics
Notes from Physics 2 and Physics 7, Electricity and Magnitism, and other miscellaneous notes.
Class notes from the following courses: German , practive notebook; Linear Drawing, November 7, 1902; Examinations, Physics 1; Chemistry, 1899
